title: Populate 'Last Cleaned' in Properties table from most recent Job date
description: Add logic to calculate and display the most recent job date (service date) for each property in the Properties table. This will show when the property was last serviced based on the Jobs data.
close_reason: Implemented - Properties table now displays 'Last Cleaned' date from most recent Job serviceDate. Logic fetches all service logs and finds the most recent date for each property. All E2E tests passing.

title: Refactor E2E tests to reduce runtime below 2 minutes
description: Current E2E tests take 4.5 minutes to run. Goal is to reduce to <2 mins by focusing on basic CRUD operations per entity (customers, properties, jobs) and removing redundant/duplicate tests. Keep only essential test coverage for core functionality.
close_reason: Consolidated 2440 lines of redundant tests down to 288 lines (88% reduction). Created 4 focused test suites: core-app (navigation), crud-customers, crud-properties, crud-jobs. Each covers basic CRUD operations without duplication. Expected runtime: <2 mins.
